# BNNS.PaddingMode.constantBitPattern(_:)

**Case**

A constant that indicates that a padding operation fills the padded area with a specified bit pattern.

## Declaration

```swift
case constantBitPattern(UInt32)
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **BNNS.PaddingMode.constantScalar(_:)**: A constant that indicates that a padding operation fills the padded area with a specified scalar value.
- **BNNS.PaddingMode.reflect**: A constant that indicates that a padding operation fills the padded area to form an odd-symmetric pattern.
- **BNNS.PaddingMode.symmetric**: A constant that indicates that a padding operation fills the padded area to form an even-symmetric pattern.
